title: Our 8 Best Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes of All Time Really Are Good for the Soul
description: Discover our best chicken noodle soup recipes of all time include quick and easy chicken noodle soup, lemon chicken orzo soup, chicken long rice soup, Chinese chicken soup, and more.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Our Top 10 Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes of All Time Really Are Good for the Soul By Bailey Fink Bailey Fink Bailey Fink is a devout home cook and a news editor at Allrecipes, covering everything from exciting product releases to the newest TikTok trends and why food tastes better at certain restaurants. In her time at Allrecipes, she has researched and written hundreds of articles on a variety of topics, including how-to guides, food news and trends, and product reviews. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on October 5, 2022 Close They say chicken noodle soup is the perfect dish for any occasion. A celebrated cure-all for everything from the common cold to a broken heart, or for simply enjoying on a chilly winter night, chicken noodle soup is the all-purpose comfort food — and it's pretty healthy too. Test out the theory that chicken noodle soup is good for both body and soul by trying our 10 best chicken noodle soup recipes of all time. We've rounded up recipes like traditional chicken noodle soup and grandma's famous chicken noodle soup, as well as creamy chicken tortellini soup and Chinese chicken noodle soup. Scroll through to check them out and find new favorite chicken soup. 01 of 11 Grandma's Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save ladywarrior0505 Warm and comforting chicken noodle soup just like grandma used to make it. And with over 1,000 5-star reviews, it will be your new go-to soup. "I have made this soup 5 times now and everyone cannot get enough. I throw in a couple of breast bones when simmering for more flavor and remove later. What a wonderful soup," says reviewer KVSMITH. 02 of 11 Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Reviewers say this soup is a copycat for Panera Bread's version. The lemony broth is paired with orzo pasta, carrots, onions, celery, and baby spinach. "Oh my God, this soup is AMAZING! It's so light but still has so much flavor. I will definitely make this again," says home cook hollisroberts. 03 of 11 Creamy Chicken Tortellini Soup View Recipe Save Liz D In just 40 minutes, you'll have this creamy soup that is great served with garlic bread. Reviewers suggest adding some more spices — like garlic, thyme, red pepper flakes, and poultry seasoning — as well as decreasing the amount of spinach. 04 of 11 Chicken Long Rice Soup View Recipe Save okinawanprincess A Hawaiian favorite, this Chicken Long Rice Soup is made with chicken, ginger, a Maui sweet onion, bean threads, green onions, and bok choy. "Growing up in Hawaii, chicken long rice was a childhood favorite. This recipe is simple to make and delicious - the ginger perfectly flavors the chicken broth, and the bok choy offers some nice and slightly chewy contrast to the dish," says reviewer wildmorel. 05 of 11 Chef John's Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save KGora Chef John's simple soup is ready in just 40 minutes, but it tastes like you were in the kitchen for much longer thanks to Chef John's homemade roasted chicken stock. "I love how simple this recipe is. This is just plain comfort food. It all comes together so quickly too," says Allrecipes Allstar Baking Nana. 06 of 11 Cold-Busting Ginger Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save zubby Feeling a little stuffed up? Try this spicy ginger chicken noodle soup that is sure to make you feel better in no time. "Made this for my sick husband who absolutely loved it. I used a rotisserie chicken instead starting with raw chicken breasts but everything else was the same as the recipe. He said his cold symptoms seemed to subside enough to be able to fall asleep. I highly recommend for the sick and the healthy," says reviewer Lindsey Lassiter Zarracina. 07 of 11 Chinese Chicken Soup View Recipe Save France C This Chinese-inspired take on traditional chicken noodle soup is made with ramen noodles, turmeric, chile paste, ginger, and soy sauce. Some reviewers like to brown the chicken first before adding it to the soup — and for even more flavor, you can cook the chicken in sesame oil and soy sauce. 08 of 11 Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine If you don't have the time to make soup from scratch, try this 30-minute recipe instead. Reviewers like to use all chicken broth instead of vegetable broth to give the soup a richer taste. "This soup was not only easy but AMAZING! Probably the best chicken soup I've eaten," says home cook SusanD?? 09 of 11 Comforting Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save SunnyDaysNora "A combination of several recipes I've made over the years to make this warm, comforting soup," says recipe creator shasty. "Great for warm days, sick days, or just any day. I sometimes serve this with mashed potatoes as well! The more flour on the pasta from rolling it out, the thicker your soup will be." 10 of 11 Slow Cooker Chicken Noodle Soup View Recipe Save Chef Mo "This is the only chicken noodle soup I'll make. Want a quality chicken noodle soup with minimal effort? Want a soup that tastes like Top Quality restaurant soup? This is your recipe," says recipe reviewer Haley McDougal. If you're planning on leftovers, you may want to cook the noodles separately and combine them as you fill up the bowls instead of adding the noodles to the slow cooker. Although the recipe calls for egg noodles, you can use any pasta shape you prefer. 11 of 11 More Inspiration KGora Our Top 20 Chicken Soup Recipes The World's 10 Best Chicken Noodle Soups More Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes Explore more: Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Chicken Soup Recipes Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
